title: NNK Rugby Stadium
text: NNK Rugby Stadium is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a>, situated in the <a href="Parow%2C%20Cape%20Town">Parow</a> suburb of <a href="Cape%20Town">Cape Town</a>, at the <a href="Western%20Cape">Western Cape Province</a> in <a href="South%20Africa">South Africa</a>. Previously it was mostly used for rugby matches. Since September 2010, where the stadium became the new home venue for the <a href="National%20First%20Division">National First Division</a> club <a href="FC%20Cape%20Town">FC Cape Town</a>, it has mainly been used to host <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches.
